languages.text: Крохотная записная книжка украшена золотым гербом фон Валанциус. Страницы из настоящей, приятно пахнущей духами бумаги покрыты безукоризненно ровными строчками. Текст запечатан причудливым шифром, но вам не нужно знать, что там написано, чтобы угадать автора. Этот каллиграфически совершенный почерк хорошо вам знаком.

The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.
languages.original_text: Крохотная записная книжка украшена золотым гербом фон Валанциус. Страницы из настоящей, приятно пахнущей духами бумаги покрыты безукоризненно ровными строчками. Текст запечатан причудливым шифром, но вам не нужно знать, что там написано, чтобы угадать автора. Этот каллиграфически совершенный почерк хорошо вам знаком.

traits.locale_text: The tiny notebook is adorned by the von Valancius's family crest. The pages made from the real paper have a nice scent of perfume to them and are covered in perfectly straight lines of words. The text is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you don't have to know the contents of it to know the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.

languages.text: Le petit carnet est décoré des armoiries de la maison von Valancius. Ses pages en papier véritable dégagent une odeur agréable de parfum et sont couvertes de lignes de mots parfaitement droites. Leur signification est protégée par un chiffrage complexe, mais vous n'avez pas besoin de comprendre ce qui est écrit pour identifier l'auteur. Vous ne connaissez que trop bien cette écriture parfaitement calligraphiée.
languages.original_text: The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.

traits.locale_text: Le petit carnet est décoré des armoiries de la famille von Valancius. Ses pages en papier véritable dégagent une odeur agréable de parfum et sont couvertes de lignes de mots parfaitement droites. Le texte est protégé par un chiffrage complexe, mais vous n'avez pas besoin de comprendre ce qui est écrit pour identifier l'auteur. Vous ne connaissez que trop bien cette écriture parfaitement calligraphiée.

languages.text: Este pequeño cuaderno está adornado con el escudo de armas de la casa von Valancius. Las páginas, de papel auténtico, tienen un agradable aroma a un perfume y están cubiertas de líneas de palabras perfectamente rectas. El significado del texto está oculto tras un complejo código, pero no necesitas leerlo para saber quién lo ha escrito. Conoces muy bien esta caligrafía impoluta.
languages.original_text: The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.

traits.locale_text: Este pequeño cuaderno está adornado con el emblema familiar de los von Valancius. Las páginas, de papel auténtico, tienen el aroma de un perfume y están cubiertas de líneas de palabras perfectamente rectas. El texto está oculto tras un complejo código, pero no necesitas leerlo para saber quién lo ha escrito. Conoces muy bien esta caligrafía impoluta.

languages.text: 这个小小的笔记本上装饰着冯·瓦兰修斯家族的纹章。书页由真正的纸制成，散发着令人愉悦的香水味，上面写满了直体文字。虽然文字被精密的加密器加密过，但光是看着字迹，你就知道是这个笔记本的主人是谁。这种典雅的笔迹你实在是太熟悉了。
languages.original_text: The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.

traits.locale_text: 这个小小的笔记本上装饰着冯·瓦兰修斯家族的文章。书页由真正的纸制成，散发着令人愉悦的香水味，上面写满了直体文字。虽然文字被精密的加密器加密过，但光是看着字迹，你就知道是这个笔记本的主人是谁。这种典雅的笔迹你实在是太熟悉了。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章があしらわれた小さなノート。本物の紙で作られたページには香水のいい香りが漂い、定規で引いたようなまっすぐな文字で覆われている。テキストは複雑な暗号でロックされているが、その内容を知らなくても筆者を特定できる。この完璧な筆跡は、あなたにとって馴染み深いものだ。
languages.original_text: The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章があしらわれた小さなノート。本物の紙で作られたページには香水のいい香りが漂い、定規で引いたようなまっすぐな文字で覆われている。テキストは複雑な暗号でロックされているが、その内容を知らなくても筆者を特定できる。この完璧な筆跡は、あなたにとって馴染み深いものだ。

languages.text: Das winzige Notizbuch ist mit dem Wappen des Hauses Valancius verziert. Die Seiten aus echtem Papier duften wohlriechend nach Parfüm und sind mit makellos geraden Zeilen beschrieben. Der Text ist durch einen ausgeklügelten Code verschlüsselt, doch du musst den Inhalt nicht kennen, um den Autor identifizieren zu können. Du kennst diese perfekte kalligrafische Handschrift sehr gut.
languages.original_text: The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.

traits.locale_text: Das winzige Notizbuch ist mit dem Familienwappen der Familie von Valancius verziert. Die Seiten aus echtem Papier duften wohlriechend nach Parfüm und sind mit makellos geraden Zeilen beschrieben. Der Text ist durch einen ausgeklügelten Code verschlüsselt, doch du musst den Inhalt nicht kennen, um den Autor identifizieren zu können. Du kennst diese perfekte kalligrafische Handschrift sehr gut.

languages.text: Von Valancius Hanesi armasıyla süslenmiş, küçük bir not defteri. Sayfaları gerçek kâğıttan yapılmış ve hoş bir parfüm kokusuna sahip. İçindeki yazılar, cetvelle çizilmiş gibi dümdüz. Yazıların anlamı karmaşık bir şekilde şifrelenmiş fakat yazarın kim olduğunu anlamak için içeriği bilmene gerek yok. Bu güzel el yazısını gayet iyi tanıyorsun.
languages.original_text: The tiny notebook is adorned with the coat of arms of House von Valancius. The pages made from real paper carry a pleasant scent of perfume and are covered in ruler-straight lines of text. Their meaning is locked behind an intricate cipher, but you do not need to know the contents of it to identify the author. You know this perfect calligraphic handwriting all too well.
